variables.name: cos_bucket_name
variables.description: Name your free vibe code bucket—where your sample app will live and serve your users. Smart default lets you launch instantly.

variables.name: cos_region
variables.description: Pick the cloud region where your bucket will live and your vibes go global. Default is fast and reliable.

variables.name: cos_resource_group
variables.description: Choose which resource group to place your bucket in. Default is 'default' so you can get started quickly.

variables.name: index_html_path
variables.description: Specify the path to your sample app's index.html file. Our starter app is the default, but if you paste your own code it will replace it—totally vibes.

variables.name: public_access
variables.description: Do you want everyone to see your app? Default is true so your vibes are instantly shareable, but you can make it private if you like.

variables.name: vibe_code
variables.description: Paste your sample app HTML here. Default is a starter app, but pasting your own code will overwrite it—your vibes, your rules!
